{
  "concept": "book",
  "colour":
    "value": false,
    "reason": "While books can have covers with various colors, color does not meaningfully describe a book's inherent properties."
  ,
  "shape":
    "value": true,
    "reason": "The shape of a bound collection of pages is an essential characteristic of a book."
  ,
  "location":
    "value": true,
    "reason": "Location can help understand the context in which a book exists or is used."
  ,
  "texture":
    "value": false,
    "reason": "Texture, while relevant to individual components (paper), does not universally apply as a key descriptor for what characterizes books in general."
  ,
  "material":
    "value": true,
    "reason": "The primary material (paper) is crucial for defining the nature of a book."
  ,
  "scenario":
    "value": false,
    "reason": "A scenario, while it might describe how a book is used or found, does not inherently define what a book is."
  ,
  "pattern":
    "value": false,
    "reason": "Patterns on the cover do not contribute to understanding the inherent nature of a book as a written work."
  ,
  "context":
    "value": true,
    "reason": "Context helps in understanding the purpose, relevance, or type of information conveyed within a book."
  ,
  "disposition":
    "value": false,
    "reason": "The disposition (state of being) does not contribute to the essential characteristics of what constitutes a book as described."
  ,
  "function":
    "value": true,
    "reason": "A book's primary function is to convey information or tell stories, which is universally relevant across all concepts and types of books."
  ,
  "size":
    "value": true,
    "reason": "Size can affect the usability and purpose of a book but is also an inherent characteristic that varies among different books."
  ,
  "weight":
    "value": false,
    "reason": "The weight of a book, while it might be relevant in certain contexts (e.g., portability), does not contribute significantly to defining what a book inherently is."
  ,
  "temperature":
    "value": false,
    "reason": "Temperature does not have any relevance to the characterization or understanding of books as written works or compositions."
  ,
  "value":
    "value": false,
    "reason": "Value, while it might be relevant in terms of economic value or perceived worth, is not a descriptor that helps understand what constitutes a book."
}
